item.source: How do I edit NPC drops & spawn time

item.title: How do I edit NPC drops & spawn time
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

For NPC drops,

  1. go find file npcdrops.cfg

  2. say you wanted a man to drop coins

ex. npcdrop = 2 995 50000 100

in the format of 1# is the monster 2# is the item 3# ammount of item 4# chance of drop

for spawn time

  1. Find the file npc.cfg

  2. hit CTRL + F

  3. Search for the monsters ID number, or the monster by name

  4. THe 3rd number after the name is the spawn rate

150 = 1.5 mins

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit NPC drops & spawn time
